web_snippets: Anthony Roth Costanzo joined Opera Philadelphia as General Director & President on June 1, 2024. A GRAMMY-winning countertenor and creative producer.
Countertenor Anthony Roth Costanzo began performing ... In June 2024, he began his tenure as the General Director and President of Opera Philadelphia.
“Anthony Roth Costanzo is one of the most gifted and intelligent artists to ever perform with Opera Philadelphia, and he is the ideal choice to lead the company ...
